channel.title: Plagues Protocol
channel.generator: Webpage HTML Export plugin for Obsidian

item.title: Welcome
item.description:
PLAGUES DOCTORPlague Doctor is a powerful, privacy-focused tool that allows you to manage and deploy Plague Protocol systems with minimal setup. Built with security-first principles, it enables seamless creation and management of cross-platform, quantum-resistant communication systems that operate entirely offline. Windows • Linux • Easy To Add Platforms • Fully Offline • Post Quantum Computing Resistant • No BS
View on GitHub • Walker Industries • Discord • Patreon Plagues Protocol • Launch Plague Doctor Select "2 - Create a new Plague system" Enter the target directory path Specify your project name (follows Windows/Linux naming conventions) The system will generate: Core interfaces and utilities Platform-specific implementations (Windows/Linux) Security infrastructure Example services Workers are platform-specific service instances that run with elevated privileges: Select "3 - Add a new Plague worker" Navigate to your existing Plague project Choose a project from the list Name your worker (e.g., "AuthService", "DataProcessor") The tool creates: Linux worker (Unix socket-based) Windows worker (Named pipe-based) Self-verifying integrity checks Integrity Verification: Every worker verifies its own executable and dependencies against cryptographic manifests before starting. Local-Only Communication: Uses OS-native IPC: Windows: Named pipes with ACL protection Linux: Unix sockets with file permissions Automatic Privilege Separation: Workers run with necessary privileges only, minimizing attack surface.
Code: NON-AI MPL 2.0 Artwork: © Kennaness — NO AI training. NO reproduction. NO exceptions.
Unauthorized use of the artwork — including but not limited to copying, distribution, modification, or inclusion in any machine-learning training dataset — is strictly prohibited and will be prosecuted to the fullest extent of the law.
